item.title: 法国 Canal+ 开始在伦敦交易，推进全球化进程
item.description: 亿万富翁文森特-博洛雷（Vincent Bolloré）将法国付费电视业务从维旺迪公司（Vivendi SE）分拆出来的 Canal+ 开始在伦敦交易，这是对旨在提高业务价值的分拆计划的首次测试。【原文：Canal+, the French pay-TV business being split off from Vivendi SE by billionaire Vincent Bolloré, started trading in London in the first test of a spinoff plan aimed at boosting the value of the businesses.】

item.title: 希腊梅特伦公司提交伦敦上市申请
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Metlen Energy & Metals SA 周一提交了在伦敦证券交易所上市的申请。【原文：Metlen Energy & Metals SA filed an application Monday to list shares on the London Stock Exchange, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛经济学家认为美联储 1 月份不会降息
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The Federal Reserve is likely to signal a slower future pace of easing when it meets later this week and then skip cutting interest rates in January, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. economists.】

item.title: 对冲基金豪赌欧洲天然气引发暴跌风险
item.description: 能源危机爆发后，对冲基金被剧烈的价格波动所吸引，纷纷涌入欧洲天然气市场。对冲基金的影响力越来越大，现在有可能引发市场下滑。【原文：Hedge funds piled into Europe’s gas market in the aftermath of the energy crisis, drawn to the intense price volatility. Their clout has grown so big that it now risks triggering a slump.】

item.title: 这家炉灶公司希望改变世界的能源使用方式
item.description:
它还希望结束火炉文化战争。【原文：

It also wants to end the stove culture wars.

item.title: 奇数：这种炉子可能会改变您使用能源的方式（播客）
item.description: 美国的一场小型文化战争与电炉有关。在一些人看来，电炉更节能，对空气质量也更好。在另一些人看来，对电炉的要求代表了政府的越权行为，使人们失去了使用燃气灶的自由。Impulse Labs 希望改变整个话题。该公司生产的电磁炉— 与大多数电炉— 非常不同。【原文：One of the minor culture wars in America has to do with electric stoves. To some, they’re more energy efficient and better for air quality. To others, electric stove requirements represent government overreach, and a loss of freedom to use a gas range. Impulse Labs wants to change the whole conversation. The company produces an induction stove — very different than most electric stoves — that it claims can not only produce superior food, but can also be a catalyst for electrification, thanks to】

item.title: 欧元区私营部门萎缩因服务业反弹而缓解
item.description: 由于服务业的贡献大于预期，12 月份欧元区私营部门的萎缩程度低于预期。【原文：The euro-area’s private sector shrank less than anticipated in December thanks to a bigger than expected contribution from the services sector.】

item.title: 毛里求斯对前中央银行行长发出逮捕令
item.description: 毛里求斯警方对前中央银行行长 Harvesh Seegolam 下达了逮捕令，以调查一起共谋诈骗案。【原文：Mauritius’ police issued an arrest order for former central bank Governor Harvesh Seegolam in connection with an inquiry into a case of conspiracy to defraud.】

item.title: Entain 在澳大利亚可能面临民事洗钱罚款
item.description: 拥有 Ladbrokes 的博彩公司 Entain Plc 表示，经过两年的调查，澳大利亚反洗钱监管机构已对该集团在当地的子公司启动民事处罚程序。【原文：Entain Plc, the gambling company that owns Ladbrokes, said that Australia’s anti-money laundering regulator had opened civil penalty proceedings against the group’s local subsidiary following a two-year investigation.】

item.title: 服务业反弹，德国私营部门收缩缓解
item.description: 由于服务业恢复增长，德国商业活动的萎缩在 12 月份略有缓解，但制造商的困境进一步恶化。【原文：The contraction in German business activity eased a little in December thanks to a resumption in services-sector growth, though manufacturers’ struggles worsened.】

item.title: 希腊银行可能因支付费用削减而面临 1 亿欧元的损失
item.description: 欧洲银行股票投资公司（Eurobank Equities Investment Firm SA）表示，希腊贷款机构可能会因银行减少或取消向客户收取的各种支付费用而面临约 1 亿欧元（1.05 亿美元）的损失。【原文：Greek lenders may face a cost of about €100 million ($105 million) from the reduction or elimination of various payment fees that banks charge their clients, Eurobank Equities Investment Firm SA said.】

item.title: 法国私营部门因政治困境连续第四个月萎缩
item.description: 法国私营部门的商业活动连续第四个月萎缩，原因是政府因预算纠纷而倒台，打击了人们的信心。【原文：Private-sector business activity in France shrank for a fourth month as the fall of the government over a budget dispute sapped confidence.】

item.title: 英国将调整社交媒体规则以应对夏季骚乱
item.description: 英国监管机构 Ofcom 周一发表声明称，英国计划将其针对网上非法材料的规定扩大到包括社交媒体公司如何应对国内最近发生的骚乱等危机。【原文：The UK plans to extend its rules against illegal material online to cover how social media companies respond to crises like the recent riots in the country, according to a statement from British regulator Ofcom on Monday.】

item.title: 190 亿美元到期墙迫在眉睫，阿联酋亟待偿还美元债务
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国正在疯狂举债，而且看来要把举债狂潮延续到新的一年。【原文：The United Arab Emirates is on a borrowing binge — and looks set to extend its debt-issuance spree well into the new year.】

item.title: 穆迪因预算担忧下调评级后法国债券下跌
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）下调法国信用评级后，法国债券下跌，极右翼领导人玛丽娜-勒庞（Marine Le Pen）因预算纠纷推翻前任总理后，法国官员面临更大压力。【原文：French bonds fell after Moody’s Ratings cut the country’s credit rating, putting more pressure on officials after far-right leader Marine Le Pen toppled the previous prime minister over a budget dispute.】

item.title: 巴伐利亚诺迪克公司与血清研究所签署 Mpox 疫苗协议
item.description: 巴伐利亚北欧公司（Bavarian Nordic A/S）与世界最大的疫苗生产商印度血清研究所（Serum Institute of India Pvt）达成协议，由该公司生产丹麦生物技术公司的麻痘疫苗。【原文：Bavarian Nordic A/S agreed to a deal with the world’s largest vaccine manufacturer, the Serum Institute of India Pvt, to make the Danish biotech firm’s mpox shot.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行利率方向明确，将进行更多削减
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲央行将进一步降低利率，目前通胀前景面临 "两面性 "风险。【原文：The European Central Bank will lower interest rates further, with risks to the inflation outlook now “two-sided,” President Christine Lagarde said.】

item.title: 安联斥资 17 亿美元收购新加坡保险公司股份
item.description: 安联集团（Allianz SE）撤回了以约 22 亿新元（17 亿美元）的价格收购新加坡保险公司收入保险有限公司（Income Insurance Ltd. ）多数股权的提议，原因是公众对该交易表示反对。【原文：Allianz SE withdrew an offer to buy a majority stake in Singapore insurer Income Insurance Ltd. for about S$2.2 billion ($1.7 billion), following public backlash to the deal.】

item.title: 日本认为核电是 2040 年最廉价的基础电力来源
item.description: 据预测，到 2040 年，核电将成为日本最廉价的基荷电力来源，这凸显了日本政府重启国内闲置反应堆的愿望。【原文：Nuclear power is forecast to be the cheapest baseload electricity source in Japan in 2040, highlighting the government’s desire to restart the nation’s idled reactors.】

item.title: 英国资产管理公司竞相修复 ISA 股票菜单错误
item.description: 英国从 AJ Bell Plc 到富达国际（Fidelity International）等投资平台都在争分夺秒地修复一个错误，这个错误允许客户在免税账户上交易一些不符合条件的股票，而客户则担心可能会遭受损失。【原文：Investment platforms in the UK ranging from AJ Bell Plc to Fidelity International are scrambling to fix an error that allows clients to trade in some ineligible stocks on their tax-free accounts, while customers fear potential losses.】

item.title: 据说 LG 将为印度业务 IPO 筹集高达 150 亿美元的资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在分析师和投资者作出初步反馈后，LG 电子公司正在考虑将其印度业务部门的估值提高到高达 150 亿美元，计划明年在孟买上市。【原文：LG Electronics Inc. is considering increasing the valuation of its Indian unit to as much as $15 billion in a planned listing in Mumbai next year after initial feedback from analysts and investors, according people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将再次下挫，英镑跌破 1.27 美元
诺和诺德投资 12 亿美元在丹麦新建工厂
item.description: Ozempic 生产商诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）将投资 85 亿克朗（12 亿美元）在丹麦新建一座大型工厂，以帮助满足其大片药物日益增长的需求。【原文：Ozempic maker Novo Nordisk A/S is investing 8.5 billion kroner ($1.2 billion) to build a new major factory in Denmark to help meet growing demand for its blockbuster drugs.】

item.title: 特朗普、习近平与大交易的艺术
item.description:
邀请中国领导人参加就职典礼，即使他不来，也是一个很大的姿态。这对特朗普有什么好处？【原文：

Inviting China’s leader to the inauguration, even if he doesn’t come, is a big gesture. What’s in it for Trump?

】

item.title: 中国减少原油采购，主要航线油轮运价下跌
item.description: 今年以来，由于中国这个第一大进口国的需求放缓，以及欧佩克+推迟重启闲置供应，从中东到中国的基准航线--最大船舶的原油运输现货价格已下降了三分之一。【原文：Spot rates for hauling crude on the largest vessels from the Middle East to China, a benchmark route, have sunk by a third this year as demand in the top importer slows and OPEC+ delays the restart of idled supply.】

item.title: 经济困境加剧，德国债券将再创辉煌
item.description: 进入 2025 年，德国将面临大选、与美国的贸易紧张局势以及可能出现的经济衰退。对于债务投资者来说，这是又一个回报丰厚之年的完美秘诀。【原文：Germany is heading into 2025 facing a snap election, trade tensions with the US and a possible recession. For debt investors that’s a perfect recipe for another strong year of returns.】

item.title: 印度 12 月经济活动有所扩张，最新采购经理人指数显示
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项速报调查显示，由于商品和服务需求在新订单的推动下持续改善，印度12月份的经济活动步伐加快。【原文：India’s economic activity gained pace in December, as demand for goods and services continued to improve, driven by new orders, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 印尼继续上调增值税，提供福利以减轻打击
item.description: 印尼将在 2025 年继续提高增值税，同时提供一系列激励措施，以减轻对消费和经济增长的影响。【原文：Indonesia will proceed with its value-added tax hike in 2025, while offering a raft of incentives to mitigate the impact on consumption and economic growth.】

item.title: 电视工作室对 Skydance 与派拉蒙的交易亮起更多红旗
item.description: Fuse Media 是一家拉丁裔拥有的娱乐公司，它已成为对 Skydance 与派拉蒙合并案提出异议的最新一方，它向联邦监管机构表示，派拉蒙主席莎莉-雷德斯通（Shari Redstone）将在交易中获得过高报酬，从而损害媒体业务。【原文：Fuse Media, a Latino-owned entertainment company, has become the latest party to raise objections to the pending Skydance-Paramount merger, suggesting to a federal regulator that Paramount Chair Shari Redstone would be overpaid in the deal, to the detriment of the media business.】

item.title: 星巴克任命首位中国增长官以促进销售
item.description: 星巴克公司在中国聘请了有史以来第一位首席增长官，负责吸引年轻咖啡饮用者回流，因为这家美国连锁店在其最大的国际市场上正与价格更低的本地竞争对手苦苦挣扎。【原文：Starbucks Corp. hired its first-ever chief growth officer in China, tasked with luring back young coffee drinkers as the US chain struggles with cheaper local rivals in its biggest international market.】
